channel.title: django devkit appliance on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in django devkit appliance on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Django DevKit Appliance 1.3
item.description: It’s been a while since I pimped my Django Dev Kit Appliance, mostly because I have been really busy with work, projects and my kid’s end of the school year. Anyhow, I rebuilt the appliance to use the latest Django 1.3 release plus several other updated packages such as git and mercurial. I have also stopped building Amazon EC2 images and will from now on only provide ISOs and Raw Filesystem images.
